constructor.name: Auction
constructor.post: hBidder' = -1 AND hBid' = 0 AND ended' <=> FALSE AND won' <=> FALSE AND FORALL (i:INT): pr'[i] = 0

action.name: bid
action.pre: bidder >= 0 AND bid > 0 AND bid > hBid AND bidder /= hBidder AND ended <=> FALSE AND pr[bidder] = 0
action.post: pr'[hBidder] = hBid AND hBid' = bid AND hBidder' = bidder

action.name: withdraw
action.pre: bidder >= 0 AND bidder /= hBidder AND pr[bidder] > 0

action.name: win
action.pre: bidder >= 0 AND bidder = hBidder AND ended AND won <=> FALSE
